thread.title: Ground News - Buckley: Opt out of the Liberty Bowl? Not this Tigers center. No way.
thread.title_full: Ground News - Buckley: Opt out of the Liberty Bowl? Not this Tigers center. No way.

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Buckley: Opt out of the Liberty Bowl? Not this Tigers center. No way.
text:
Summary by Ground News University of Memphis center Jacob Likes, 70, during the Tigers game against Bethune-Cookman Sept. 2. Likes cried when he thought he'd played his last game at Liberty Stadium. Likes is more than football. He has a knack for business and likes Western movies and country music. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
The Daily Memphian Center Buckley: Opt out of the Liberty Bowl? Not this Tigers center. No way. Who says you can’t go home again? Memphis’ Jacob Likes cried when he thought he’d played his last game at Liberty Stadium. Now there’s another.
